name: 3rd International Nursing Networking Conference
content: We are thrilled to extend our heartfelt invitation to the 3rd International Nursing Networking Conference, scheduled to take place in the vibrant city of Las Vegas, USA from October 07-09, 2024\. This highly anticipated event offers a hybrid experience, allowing participants to join either in person or virtually, ensuring inclusivity and collaboration on a global scale. Under the overarching theme of "Advances and Innovations in Health Care and Nursing" this Healthcare Symposium aims to ignite discussions and inspire breakthroughs in the field of nursing. In essence, the Nursing Research Conference 2024 promises to be an enriching and transformative experience, fostering collaboration, innovation, and excellence in nursing. We eagerly anticipate the opportunity to connect with you, whether in person or virtually, as we collectively strive to shape the future of healthcare through nursing excellence. Website: https://nursingnetworkconference.com/ Abstract submission: https://nursingnetworkconference.com/abstract-submission Registration: https://nursingnetworkconference.com/register
